title: The Companion
description: Miss Emmaline Tremaine will stop at nothing to retrieve her family's priceless jewelry, even if it means foiling her two suitors and hoodwinking the dreaded Lady Kirkcady. However, all bets are off when Lord Robert enters the picture and must save Emmaline from her most ardent suitor, the hapless Lord Philip. The Companion is a sweet Regency short story, the second story in the Lord Philip series. It is 23,000 words, or approximately 64 pages.
author: Lydia M. Sheridan
